TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class CommittableTransaction : System.Transactions.Transaction, IAsyncResult, IDisposable, System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable

.class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit CommittableTransaction extends System.Transactions.Transaction implements class System.IAsyncResult, class System.IDisposable, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public NotInheritable Class CommittableTransaction Inherits Transaction Implements IAsyncResult, IDisposable, ISerializable
public ref class CommittableTransaction sealed : System::Transactions::Transaction, IAsyncResult, IDisposable, System::Runtime::Serialization::ISerializable
type CommittableTransaction = class inherit Transaction interface ISerializable interface IDisposable interface IAsyncResult

span.span: Describes a committable transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別為應用程式提供使用交易的明確方式，而非隱含地使用 類別。The class provides an explicit way for applications to use a transaction, as opposed to using the class implicitly. 與 類別不同的是，應用程式寫入器需要特別呼叫 和 方法，才能認可或中止交易。Unlike the class, the application writer needs to specifically call the and methods in order to commit or abort the transaction. 不過，只有在交易的建立者可以認可交易。However, only the creator of a transaction can commit the transaction. 複本可認可的交易，因此，透過取得方法不會認可。Therefore, copies of a committable transaction, obtained through the method are not committable. > [!NOTE] > 我們建議您建立隱含的交易使用類別，以便為您自動管理環境交易內容。We recommend that you create implicit transactions using the class, so that the ambient transaction context is automatically managed for you. 您也應該使用和需要使用相同的異動，跨多個函式呼叫或多個執行緒呼叫的應用程式的類別。You should also use the and class for applications that require the use of the same transaction across multiple function calls or multiple thread calls. 如需有關此模型的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 實作隱含異動使用異動範圍](~/docs/framework/data/transactions/implementing-an-implicit-transaction-using-transaction-scope.md)主題。For more information on this model, see the [Implementing An Implicit Transaction Using Transaction Scope](~/docs/framework/data/transactions/implementing-an-implicit-transaction-using-transaction-scope.md) topic. 建立不會自動設定環境交易，亦即您的程式碼中執行的交易。Creating a does not automatically set the ambient transaction, which is the transaction your code executes in. 您可以取得或設定環境交易，藉由呼叫靜態屬性的全域物件。You can get or set the ambient transaction by calling the static property of the global object. 如需有關環境交易的詳細資訊，請參閱 「 使用 TransactionScopeOption 管理交易流程 」 一節[實作隱含異動使用異動範圍](~/docs/framework/data/transactions/implementing-an-implicit-transaction-using-transaction-scope.md)主題。For more information on ambient transactions, see the " Managing Transaction Flow using TransactionScopeOption" section of the [Implementing An Implicit Transaction Using Transaction Scope](~/docs/framework/data/transactions/implementing-an-implicit-transaction-using-transaction-scope.md) topic. 如果未設定環境交易，資源管理員上的任何作業不是該交易的一部分。If the ambient transaction is not set, any operation on a resource manager is not part of that transaction. 您需要明確地設定及重設環境交易，以確保資源管理員運作正確的交易內容下。You need to explicitly set and reset the ambient transaction to ensure that resource managers operate under the right transaction context. 直到已被認可，與交易相關的所有資源都會保持都鎖定。Until a has been committed, all the resources involved with the transaction are still locked. 您無法重複使用 物件，A object cannot be reused. 一旦已經認可或回復，它無法在交易中重複使用或設定為目前的環境交易內容。Once it has been committed or rolled back, it cannot be used again in a transaction or set as the current ambient transaction context. ## Examples 下列範例會建立兩個的新執行個體、 認可和復原回它們分別。The following sample creates two new instances of , commits and rolls back them respectively.

summary.span: 開始嘗試非同步認可交易。

span.span: Begins an attempt to commit the transaction asynchronously.

returns.span: 介面，可由呼叫端用來檢查非同步作業的狀態，或等候作業完成。

span.span: An interface that can be used by the caller to check the status of the asynchronous operation, or to wait for the operation to complete.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會立即傳回之前已完成的交易。This method returns immediately, before the transaction has been completed. 異動 和 認可在不同的執行緒，而`asyncCallback`完成時叫用委派。The transaction then commits on a different thread, and the `asyncCallback` delegate is invoked when it has completed. 會呼叫這個方法之後，您不會收到交易的結果直到您呼叫。After this method is called, you do not receive the outcome of the transaction until you call . > [!NOTE] > 認可程序可能以同步方式完成，此方法呼叫內。The commit process may complete synchronously inside this method call.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Commit() cil managed

span.span: Attempts to commit the transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法時，會輪詢已註冊要參與交易的所有物件，並可以獨立會指出其投票認可或回復交易。When this method is called, all objects that have registered to participate in the transaction are polled and can independently indicate their vote to either commit or roll back the transaction. 如果任何參與者表決來回復交易時，會回復，且此方法會擲回例外狀況。If any participant votes to roll back the transaction, it is rolled back and this method throws a exception. 這是正常執行一次的交易，您的程式碼應該攔截並處理這類例外狀況。This is a normal occurrence for a transaction and your code should catch and process such exceptions. 和封鎖直到交易處理的第一個階段完成為止。 and block until the first phase of transaction processing is complete. 第一階段結束之後的所有資源管理員，並在交易中的登記皆已投票給交易結果而已永久地決定要認可或中止交易。The first phase ends after all resource managers and enlistments in the transaction have voted on the transaction outcome and the has durably decided to commit or abort the transaction. 第二階段一律是處理的非同步的。The second phase of processing is always asynchronous. 因此，就只是已認可從給定的交易內的資料將會立即可用之後不使用另一筆交易，若要檢視此資料時不保證。Therefore, there is no guarantee that data just committed from within a given transaction will be immediately available afterwards when not using another transaction to view this data. 因為這個方法會封鎖直到交易處理的第一個階段完成，您必須非常小心使用此方法，在 Windows Form (WinForm) 應用程式中或死結時可能會發生。Because this method blocks until the first phase of transaction processing is complete, you should be extremely careful when using this method in a Windows Form (WinForm) application, or a deadlock can occur. 如果您呼叫內一個 WinForm 控制項事件 （例如按一下按鈕），這個方法，並使用同步方法來直接執行還在處理交易，某些 UI 工作 （例如變更色彩） 控制項將會發生死結。If you call this method inside one WinForm Control event (for example, clicking a button), and use the synchronous method to direct the control to perform some UI tasks (for example, changing colors) in the middle of processing the transaction, a deadlock will happen. 這是因為方法是同步，背景工作執行緒，直到 UI 執行緒完成其作業。This is because the method is synchronous and blocks the worker thread until the UI thread finishes its job. 不過，在我們的案例中，UI 執行緒也等待認可交易的背景工作執行緒。However, in our scenario, the UI thread is also waiting for the worker thread to commit the transaction. 結果是，它們都可以繼續作業，範圍會無限期等待認可完成。The result is that none is able to proceed and the scope waits indefinitely for the Commit to finish. 您應該使用而非可能的情況下，因為它是非同步，因此較不容易發生死結。You should use rather than wherever possible, because it is asynchronous and thus less prone to deadlock.

summary.span: 結束非同步認可交易的嘗試。

span.span: Ends an attempt to commit the transaction asynchronously.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您應該呼叫這個方法中做為參數指定的回呼委派方法，當您完成任何與非同步認可相關聯的清除工作。You should call this method in the callback delegate specified as a parameter to the method, when you have finished any cleanup work associated with the asynchronous commitment. 您也可以不需等到委派早呼叫這個方法。You can also call this method early without waiting for the delegate. 如果您呼叫這個方法時，交易尚未完成，則這個方法會等候其完成。If, by the time you call this method, the transaction has not completed, this method waits for its completion. > [!CAUTION] > 所傳回的屬性`asyncResult`總是`false`，即使作業同步完成。The property returned by `asyncResult` is always `false`, even if the operation completed synchronously. 和封鎖直到交易處理的第一個階段完成為止。 and block until the first phase of transaction processing is complete. 第一階段結束之後的所有資源管理員，並在交易中的登記皆已投票給交易結果而已永久地決定要認可或中止交易。The first phase ends after all resource managers and enlistments in the transaction have voted on the transaction outcome and the has durably decided to commit or abort the transaction. 第二階段一律是處理的非同步的。The second phase of processing is always asynchronous. 因此，就只是已認可從給定的交易內的資料將會立即可用之後不使用另一筆交易，若要檢視此資料時不保證。Therefore, there is no guarantee that data just committed from within a given transaction will be immediately available afterwards when not using another transaction to view this data.

exception.span: 呼叫 且交易第一次復原。

span.span: is called and the transaction rolls back for the first time.
